job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Skycart is currently looking for a Software Development Engineer to join our team. </p><p><br></p><p>We're a drone hardware/software and logistics company currently working on COVID-19 vaccine and other medical supply deliveries. </p><p><br></p><p>We're looking to expand to last-mile e-commerce deliveries globally throughout the next several years.&nbsp;We're in the process of a funding round right now on a platform called Wefunder, and we've had a decent amount of investment from a few angels already without ever launching publicly.&nbsp;The compensation to start off for this role will be in equity shares, however, given that is a part-time role, you are welcome to be working in an external role to Skycart.&nbsp;If this sounds interesting to you, go ahead and drop your resume in the chat, and our Head of Software, Stephen Enright will proceed with the next steps.</p><p><br></p><p>Full-stack app development experience is a plus.</p><p><br></p><ul><li>Worked on mobile apps</li><li>Worked on backend (cloud) software</li><li>Experience with drones preferable</li><li>Worked on relevant projects </li><li>Must know: Go (or golang), Java, React and Android development</li><li>Knowledge in: C,C++,C#, Python, Golang (GO), Java, REST API, Android development kit, React, Flutter, Elastic Search, Microservices, Security</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p>
